concept.title: Classroom Equipment
concept.shortdesc: Our classrooms are outfitted witht the most up-to-date equipment that will enhance your experience.

conbody.p: When you rent out our classrooms, you are also renting out some of the newest, high quality equipment:

ul.li: 1 Epson Powerlite Ceiling Projector and Screen

conbody.p: Ours computers run varieties of programs, from TextWrangler to Adobe InDesign, to suit your classroom needs. Although they are Apple computers, they also have the capability to run windows.
With the ceiling projector, you will be able to display content for the entire room.
There are additional outlets between every computer to charge any additional electronic devices.
